title: Luigi Cozzi's Godzilla ( Cozzilla, 1977) Geno Cuddy Restoration

sources.title: Luigi Cozzi's Godzilla ( Cozzilla, 1977) Geno Cuddy Restoration
sources.description: EDIT (5/31/2019): Added English subtitles in SRT form. Â  An attempted restoration I undertook of Luigi Cozzi's infamous 1977 colorized reissue of Godzilla, this was done with a 35mm print. I must stress, I am not a professional so film snobs beware.
